column4: hi, ubuntu 12.04 gets stuck at boot, hub 2-1 port 2 disabled by hub (EMI?), re-enabling has shown up twice now, any clues what's happening?
there's something wrong with a USB device you have attached. unplug them one by one (or all for startters, then re-plug them one by one and reboot each time) to single out the problematic device.
this could be due to lack of power on the USB hub you have there.
do you have an usb extender or a monitor which works as a usb hub?
